column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sozin says : " I remember my friend . "
#Text=Sozin says : " Looks like I win again , Roku . "
#Text=Roku says : " Are you kidding ?
#Text=" Roku says : " Back then , he was just Prince Sozin .
#Text=And he was my best friend .
#Text=" Sozin says : " Say something to her .
#Text=" Roku says : " Love is hard when you are young .
#Text=" Aang says : " You do n't have to tell me .
#Text=" Roku says : " Do n't worry , it gets better .
#Text=Now , come with me .
#Text=We have a party to attend .
#Text=" Aang says : " Wait , whose party is it ?
#Text=" Roku says : " Sozin and I shared many things , including a birthday .
#Text=" Sozin says : " Did something happen to my father ?
#Text=" Fire Sage says : " No , Prince Sozin .
#Text=We are not here for you .
#Text=We 're here to announce the identity of the next Avatar .
#Text=It is our honor to serve you , Avatar Roku .
#Text="
